targets.rawSql:
SELECT
 
  -- Détail des cases par priorité dans la période définie
  (SELECT 
      COUNT(c.CaseID) 
   FROM 
      LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] c WITH (NOLOCK)
   WHERE 
      $__timeFilter(c.[DateCreated])
      AND c.Priority = 1
  ) AS Total_Cases_Priority1,

  (SELECT 
      COUNT(c.CaseID) 
   FROM 
      LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] c WITH (NOLOCK)
   WHERE 
      $__timeFilter(c.[DateCreated])
      AND c.Priority = 2
  ) AS Total_Cases_Priority2,

  (SELECT 
      COUNT(c.CaseID) 
   FROM 
      LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] c WITH (NOLOCK)
   WHERE 
      $__timeFilter(c.[DateCreated])
      AND c.Priority = 3
  ) AS Total_Cases_Priority3,

  (SELECT 
      COUNT(c.CaseID) 
   FROM 
      LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] c WITH (NOLOCK)
   WHERE 
      $__timeFilter(c.[DateCreated])
      AND c.Priority = 4
  ) AS Total_Cases_Priority4,

  (SELECT 
      COUNT(c.CaseID) 
   FROM 
      LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] c WITH (NOLOCK)
   WHERE 
      $__timeFilter(c.[DateCreated])
      AND c.Priority = 5
  ) AS Total_Cases_Priority5;

SELECT
	msg.Alarm_Priority,
	COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  (SELECT
	CASE 
		WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'P1'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN 'P2'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 and 79 THEN 'P3'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 and 64 THEN 'P4'
		WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'P5'
	END AS Alarm_Priority,
	MsgID
FROM 
	LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg with (NOLOCK)) msg
	  JOIN
	(SELECT 
		a.DateInserted,
		atm.MARCMsgID,
		a.AlarmID,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn) TTT,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.InvestigatedOn) TTD,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn) TTR
	FROM 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) 
			JOIN 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].AlarmRule ar
		  ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID 
		WHERE 
		  ar.[AlarmType] = 5
		    and
      $__timeFilter(a.DateInserted)) amsg
		ON amsg.MARCMsgID = msg.MsgID
GROUP BY
	msg.Alarm_Priority
ORDER BY 
	CASE msg.Alarm_Priority
		WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
		WHEN 'High' THEN 2
		WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3
		WHEN 'Low' THEN 4
		WHEN 'Very Low' THEN 5
	END

SELECT
  -- Total des événements dans la période définie
  (SELECT 
      SUM(CAST(CountProcessedLogs AS BIGINT)) ll
   FROM 
      LogRhythm_LogMart.dbo.StatsDeploymentCountsHour WITH (NOLOCK) 
   WHERE 
      $__timeFilter(StatDate)
  ) AS Total_Events,

  -- Total des alarmes dans la période définie, en suivant les mêmes critères que la 2ème requête
  (SELECT 
      COUNT(*) 
   FROM 
      LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a WITH (NOLOCK)
      JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
   WHERE 
      ar.AlarmType = 5 
      AND $__timeFilter(a.DateInserted)
  ) AS Total_Alarms,

  -- Total des cases dans la période définie (toutes priorités)
  (SELECT 
      COUNT(*) 
   FROM 
      [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] WITH (NOLOCK) 
   WHERE 
      $__timeFilter([DateCreated])
  ) AS Total_Cases,

  -- Total des cases avec une priorité P3 (Priorité 3 ou 4) dans la période définie
  (SELECT 
      COUNT(*) 
   FROM 
      [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c WITH (NOLOCK) 
      JOIN LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
   WHERE 
      $__timeFilter(c.DateCreated) 
      AND c.Priority BETWEEN 3 AND 4
  ) AS Total_Cases_P3,

  -- Total des cases incidents (Priorité P2 entre 1 et 2) dans la période définie
  (SELECT 
      COUNT(*) 
   FROM 
      [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c WITH (NOLOCK) 
      JOIN LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
   WHERE 
      $__timeFilter(c.DateCreated) 
      AND c.Priority BETWEEN 3 AND 4
  ) AS Total_Cases_Incidents_P2;

SELECT 
    Entity.Name AS 'Entity',
    COUNT(AlarmName.Name) AS Total_Alarms
FROM 
    [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS Alarm
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AS AlarmName ON Alarm.AlarmRuleID = AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Entity AS Entity ON Entity.EntityID = Alarm.EntityID
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(Alarm.DateInserted)
    AND AlarmName.[AlarmRuleGroup] != 'LogRhythm Diagnostics' -- Exclusion des alarmes diagnostics
GROUP BY 
    Entity.Name
ORDER BY 
    Total_Alarms DESC;

SELECT
    e.Name AS 'Entity',                                -- Nom de l'entité
    COUNT(c.CaseNumber) AS Total_Cases                -- Nombre total de cases par entité avec priorité 3
FROM 
    LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] AS c WITH (NOLOCK)
LEFT JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.[Entity] AS e ON c.EntityID = e.EntityID -- Joindre la table Entity pour obtenir le nom de l'entité
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(c.[DateCreated])                    -- Application du filtre temporel
    AND c.Priority = 1                                -- Filtrer uniquement les cas avec priorité 3
GROUP BY 
    e.Name                                            -- Groupement par nom de l'entité
ORDER BY 
    Total_Cases DESC;                                 -- Tri par nombre total de cases en décroissant

select Tag,count(ct.CaseID) as Count FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[CaseToTag] as ct

join  [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Tag] as t on ct.TagID=t.TagID

join [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] as c on c.caseID=ct.caseid

where c.DateCreated between getdate()-30 and getdate()

Group By Tag

SELECT
    e.Name AS 'Entity',                                -- Nom de l'entité
    COUNT(c.CaseNumber) AS Total_Cases                -- Nombre total de cases par entité
FROM 
    LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] AS c WITH (NOLOCK)
LEFT JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.[Entity] AS e ON c.EntityID = e.EntityID -- Joindre la table Entity pour obtenir le nom de l'entité
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(c.[DateCreated])                    -- Application du filtre temporel
GROUP BY 
    e.Name                                            -- Groupement par nom de l'entité
ORDER BY 
    Total_Cases DESC;                                 -- Tri par nombre total de cases en décroissant

SELECT 
    Name AS [Alarm Name],
    (ISNULL(New, 0) + ISNULL(OpenAlarm, 0) + ISNULL(Working, 0) + ISNULL(Escalated, 0) + ISNULL(AutoClosed, 0) + ISNULL(FalsePositive, 0) + ISNULL(Resolved, 0) + ISNULL(UnResolved, 0) + ISNULL(Reported, 0) + ISNULL(Monitor, 0)) AS Total,
    ISNULL(Resolved, 0) AS [Resolved],
    ISNULL(FalsePositive, 0) AS [False Positive],
    
    -- Calculating resolved rate % based on total of Resolved and False Positive
    CASE 
        WHEN ISNULL(Resolved, 0) + ISNULL(FalsePositive, 0) = 0 THEN 0 
        ELSE (ISNULL(Resolved, 0) * 100.0 / (ISNULL(Resolved, 0) + ISNULL(FalsePositive, 0))) 
    END AS [Resolved Rate %],
    
    -- Calculating false positive rate % based on total of Resolved and False Positive
    CASE 
        WHEN ISNULL(Resolved, 0) + ISNULL(FalsePositive, 0) = 0 THEN 0 
        ELSE (ISNULL(FalsePositive, 0) * 100.0 / (ISNULL(Resolved, 0) + ISNULL(FalsePositive, 0))) 
    END AS [False Positive Rate %]
FROM
(
    SELECT 
        AlarmName.Name,
        COUNT(AlarmName.Name) AS AlarmCount,
        (CONVERT(nvarchar, CASE
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 0 THEN 'New'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 1 THEN 'OpenAlarm'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 2 THEN 'Working'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 3 THEN 'Escalated'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 4 THEN 'AutoClosed'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 5 THEN 'FalsePositive'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 6 THEN 'Resolved'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 7 THEN 'UnResolved'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 8 THEN 'Reported'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 9 THEN 'Monitor'
        END)) AS AlarmStatus
    FROM 
        [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS Alarm 
        JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AS AlarmName ON Alarm.AlarmRuleID = AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
    WHERE 
        $__timeFilter(Alarm.AlarmDate)
    GROUP BY 
        AlarmName.Name, AlarmStatus
) d
PIVOT
(
    MAX(AlarmCount)
    FOR AlarmStatus IN (New, OpenAlarm, Working, Escalated, AutoClosed, FalsePositive, Resolved, UnResolved, Reported, Monitor)
) piv
WHERE 
    ISNULL(Resolved, 0) > 0 OR ISNULL(FalsePositive, 0) > 0 -- Include only rows with Resolved or False Positive greater than zero
ORDER BY 
    Total DESC, [Resolved Rate %] DESC; -- Ordering by Total and Resolved Rate % in descending order

SELECT
    SUM(ISNULL(New, 0)) AS [New Alarms], -- Total des nouvelles alarmes
    SUM(ISNULL(OpenAlarm, 0) + ISNULL(Working, 0)) AS [In Progress Alarms], -- Total des alarmes en cours de traitement
    SUM(ISNULL(Escalated, 0) + ISNULL(AutoClosed, 0) + ISNULL(FalsePositive, 0) + ISNULL(Resolved, 0) + ISNULL(UnResolved, 0) + ISNULL(Reported, 0) + ISNULL(Monitor, 0)) AS [Closed Alarms], -- Total des alarmes clôturées

    -- Total des alarmes
    SUM(ISNULL(New, 0) + ISNULL(OpenAlarm, 0) + ISNULL(Working, 0) + ISNULL(Escalated, 0) + ISNULL(AutoClosed, 0) + ISNULL(FalsePositive, 0) + ISNULL(Resolved, 0) + ISNULL(UnResolved, 0) + ISNULL(Reported, 0) + ISNULL(Monitor, 0)) AS [Total Alarms]
FROM
(
    SELECT 
        AlarmName.Name,
        COUNT(AlarmName.Name) AS AlarmCount,
        (CONVERT(nvarchar, CASE
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 0 THEN 'New'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 1 THEN 'OpenAlarm'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 2 THEN 'Working'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 3 THEN 'Escalated'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 4 THEN 'AutoClosed'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 5 THEN 'FalsePositive'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 6 THEN 'Resolved'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 7 THEN 'UnResolved'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 8 THEN 'Reported'
            WHEN AlarmStatus = 9 THEN 'Monitor'
        END)) AS AlarmStatus
    FROM 
        [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS Alarm 
        JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AS AlarmName ON Alarm.AlarmRuleID = AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
    WHERE 
        $__timeFilter(Alarm.AlarmDate)
    GROUP BY 
        AlarmName.Name, AlarmStatus
) d
PIVOT
(
    MAX(AlarmCount)
    FOR AlarmStatus IN (New, OpenAlarm, Working, Escalated, AutoClosed, FalsePositive, Resolved, UnResolved, Reported, Monitor)
) piv;

SELECT 
    Alarm.AlarmID,                              -- ID de l'alarme
    Entity.Name AS [Entity],                   -- Nom de l'entité
    AlarmName.Name AS [Alarm Name],            -- Nom de l'alarme
    CONVERT(varchar, DATEDIFF(DAY, Alarm.AlarmDate, DATEADD(HOUR, -1, GETDATE()))) + ' days ' +
    CONVERT(varchar, DATEPART(HOUR, DATEADD(HOUR, -1, GETDATE()) - Alarm.AlarmDate)) + ' hours ' +
    CONVERT(varchar, DATEPART(MINUTE, DATEADD(HOUR, -1, GETDATE()) - Alarm.AlarmDate)) + ' minutes ' +
    CONVERT(varchar, DATEPART(SECOND, DATEADD(HOUR, -1, GETDATE()) - Alarm.AlarmDate)) + ' seconds' AS [Alert Age] -- Âge de l'alerte formaté corrigé
FROM 
    [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS Alarm
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AS AlarmName ON Alarm.AlarmRuleID = AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Entity AS Entity ON Alarm.EntityID = Entity.EntityID -- Joindre l'entité par EntityID
WHERE 
    (AlarmStatus = 1 OR AlarmStatus = 2) -- Filtrer sur les statuts "OpenAlarm" et "Working"
ORDER BY 
    Alarm.AlarmID; -- Tri par ID d'alarme

SELECT 
    Alarm.AlarmID,                              -- ID de l'alarme
    Entity.Name AS [Entity],                   -- Nom de l'entité
    AlarmName.Name AS [Alarm Name],            -- Nom de l'alarme
    CONVERT(varchar, DATEDIFF(DAY, Alarm.AlarmDate, DATEADD(HOUR, -1, GETDATE()))) + ' days ' +
    CONVERT(varchar, DATEPART(HOUR, DATEADD(HOUR, -1, GETDATE()) - Alarm.AlarmDate)) + ' hours ' +
    CONVERT(varchar, DATEPART(MINUTE, DATEADD(HOUR, -1, GETDATE()) - Alarm.AlarmDate)) + ' minutes ' +
    CONVERT(varchar, DATEPART(SECOND, DATEADD(HOUR, -1, GETDATE()) - Alarm.AlarmDate)) + ' seconds' AS [Alert Age] -- Âge de l'alerte formaté corrigé
FROM 
    [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS Alarm
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AS AlarmName ON Alarm.AlarmRuleID = AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Entity AS Entity ON Alarm.EntityID = Entity.EntityID -- Joindre l'entité par EntityID
WHERE 
    AlarmStatus = 0 -- Filtrer sur le statut "New" 
ORDER BY 
    Alarm.AlarmID; -- Tri par ID d'alarme
